snippet.title: Prism and Forbidden Map Preview | Season 5: Reckoning | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
Season 5 of Halo Infinite arrives on October 17, bringing with it two new maps – Prism and Forbidden.  

Descend into the heart of “Prism” an all-new arena map in Halo Infinite that delves deep underground, revealing the birthplace of the iconic Needler weapon. Amidst the maze of tunnels, caverns, and Banished mining equipment, players navigate colossal crystal formations providing both cover and strategic vantages. Prism merges natural wonder with gritty battleground, offering Spartans an immersive and visually captivating arena for intense battles. 

Discover the secrets that lie within the hallowed halls of “Forbidden”, the exhilarating new symmetrical arena map in Halo Infinite! Immerse yourself in the enigmatic atmosphere of an ancient temple nestled deep within a vibrant jungle, where the battleground spawls across open, airy spaces that echo with untold history. Rally your team and emerge victorious in this captivating battlefield. The call of adventure awaits! 

https://aka.ms/MapsS5 

#haloreckoning #haloinfinite #halo
---
